description: Vase, ceramic, pear-shaped, decorated in gold lustre and blue with kneeling figure in profile of St. Francis flanked by plants and trees, two vertical panels of stylized flowering plants and one plain panel make up remainder of body, lower section, decorated with three horizontal bands carrying stylized blossoms and dots in gold lustre, restored, Italian, XVI c.  cat. card dims H. 8-3/8'
title: Vase
